greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix logarithm of A047999 (Pascal's triangle mod 2).
comment: Row sums equal A000120 (binary 1's-counting sequence). Antidiagonal sums form A101979.
formula: T(n, k)=1 when n XOR k = 2^m for integer m>=0, T(n, k)=0 elsewhere.
example: T(n,k)=1 when n XOR k is a power of 2:
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 23 2004
